description:
Proceeds

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
43331 Survey of electricity sales and proceeds

Definition:
They exclude value added tax and electricity tax refunds.
They include the net network tariffs, electricity tax,
concession fees, surcharges pursuant to Section 19 of the
Electricity Network Charges Ordinance, under the Renewable
Energy Sources Act and under the Combined Heat and Power
Act, as well as other surcharges. A detailed list of all
surcharges is contained in the Federal Network Agencys
Monitoring Report.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Proceeds
